cast.name: 豪梅·巴拉格罗 Jaume Balagueró
艾利克斯·德·拉·伊格莱希亚 Álex de la Iglesia

introduction: Español:Productores, exhibidores y espectadores exponen sus historias ejemplares, sus vidas de sacrificio, pasión y desventuras, desafiando los tiempos y conectando pasado, presente y futuro.English:Projectionists, film exhibitors and audiences explain their stories, their misfortunes, passion and selfless lifes; challenging time and conecting past, present and future. '24 Cinemas per Second' tries to show how films exhibition evolves as a consecuence of social changes and daily customs.
